content: Hello John, thank you for calling Provide Support. How may I help you?
author: Siri

content: That is a good question, let me find out for you.
author: Nick

content: Jerry, let me transfer you to the marketing department. Steve will be able to answer your question.
author: Fred

content: Would you mind holding on for a few minutes while I am checking this with our administrator?
author: Bob

content: Rob, I’m sorry, I made a mistake and gave you the wrong price for this item. The correct price is 50
author: Higs

content: I’m sorry, Joan is not available right now. May I help you with something?
author: Appy

content: Rob, I just wanted to let you know that we are still investigating the problem. We don’t have a solution yet. I will email you as soon as we have found the bug.
author: Typeer

content: I am really sorry this has happened. Let me see if I can find a solution to it.
author: Scripter

content: Let me put you on hold for just a few moments and verify this information.
author: Inty

content: Jerry, let me review your transaction history. Please bear with me for a few more minutes.
author: Stringer

content: I’m sorry for the delay on my part. I am pulling up your account details. Please allow me another minute. I’ll be back with you right away
author: Booly

content: No problem. Thank you for your call. Have a good day.
author: Fork

content: Mary, is there anything else I might help you with today?
author: Lift

content: If any other questions arise, please feel free to contact us at any time. Thanks so much for calling. Good bye.
author: Siri

content: Thank you for chatting with us today. Have a nice day.
author: Alien
